title: Dysfunction In Pittsburgh, Josh Gordon’s New Home, and Matchups to Watch in Week 3 | The Ringer NFL Show (Ep. 305)
description:
The Ringer’s Robert Mays and Kevin Clark connect to cover the ongoing chemistry issues in Pittsburgh and Josh Gordon’s potential in New England before diving into this week's Take Shop (3:30). Then the guys break down the three biggest games of Week 3, geek out over coaching schemes, and offer their picks for 'Thursday Night Football' (25:30).

      
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
